examples.example: 西方的文化有着独特的魅力，值得我们去探索和学习。

translate.english: The culture of the West has unique charm and is worth our exploration and learning.

examples.example: 西方的天空在夕阳余晖的映照下显得格外美丽。

translate.english: The western sky looks extremely beautiful under the afterglow of the setting sun.

examples.example: 西方的天空出现了一道绚丽的彩虹，引得人们纷纷驻足欣赏。

translate.english: A magnificent rainbow appeared in the western sky, attracting people to stop and enjoy it one after another.
